name: bixbyVolume_increase
description: This function is used to increase the volume of Bixby's voice on SmartThings devices.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to increase Bixby's volume.

parameters.name: volumeLevelDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to increase Bixby's volume level.
